customAmountOptions.message: to help as much as possible
customAmountOptions.messageSingular: to help as much as possible

customContent:
Homelessness ends – and hope begins!

Just $12 provides one night of care – a hearty meal, hot shower, clean clothes, and a safe night’s rest.

For many people, that’s enough to spark hope for a better life. Thanks to your gift, they can start a new life in our wide range of recovery programs.

Lives are changing at Portland Rescue Mission! Please help as many people as possible with a generous gift today.
